short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your ChatGPT chats with tags, filters, and sorting

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TagGPT Chat Manager helps you organize and manage your ChatGPT conversations with ease. This Chrome extension allows you to categorize your chats using tags, filters, and sorting options, making it easier to find and access important conversations.

Features:

- Tagging System: Create and assign tags to your ChatGPT conversations for quick categorization.
- Advanced Filters: Easily filter chats based on assigned tags to quickly locate important conversations.
- Sorting Options: Sort chats alphabetically or by the order in which they were added for streamlined browsing.
- Pagination Support: Manage large numbers of conversations with pagination features, ensuring smooth navigation through chat histories.
- Sync Functionality: Automatically refresh and sync your conversations for real-time management.
- Privacy and Security: All your data is stored locally, ensuring the confidentiality and security of your conversations.

---

Download TagGPT Chat Manager now and transform the way you interact with ChatGPT!
